Statute.Title: Income Tax Application Rules
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Impôt sur le revenu, Règles concernant l’application de)

Transitional.Text: Transitional, R.S., c. 2 (5th Supp.), ss. 69 to 78

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 2 (5th Supp.) in force 01.03.94 see SI/94‑19
CIF, 1994, c. 7, Sch. II, ss. 200 to 202 in force on assent 17.12.91
CIF, 1994, c. 21, s. 118 in force on assent 15.06.94; ss. 119 and 120 deemed in force 01.03.94 see ss. 119 and 120; s. 121 deemed in force 02.03.94 see s. 121
CIF, 1995, c. 3, ss. 56 and 57 in force on assent 26.03.95
CIF, 1995, c. 21, s. 79 in force on assent 22.06.95
CIF, 1997, c. 25, s. 72 in force on assent 25.04.97
CIF, 1998, c. 19, ss. 248 and 249 in force on assent 18.06.98 see also ss. 248(2) and 249(4) and (5) for application of various provisions
CIF, 2000, c. 12, s. 147 in force 31.07.2000 see SI/2000-76 see also s. 147(2) and (3) re application
CIF, 2001, c. 17, ss. 232 and 249 in force on assent 14.06.2001 see also s. 249(2) re application
CIF, 2005, c. 30, s. 19 in force on assent 29.06.2005 see also s. 19(2) re application
CIF, 2007, c. 35, s. 69 in force on assent 14.12.2007. See s. 69(2) re application
CIF, 2016, c. 12, ss. 72(3) and 73(3) in force on assent 15.12.2016; ss. 72(1) and (2) and 73(1) and (2) in force 01.01.2017 see respectively 72(3) and 73(3)
